entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023
